content.rendered:
The FundFinity Grants is committed to establishing and maintaining an open, transparent and ethical workplace, where individuals who report illegal, dishonest, or fraudulent activity in good faith and/or who cooperate with authorised investigations into such misconduct will be protected against retaliation or retribution.

(Continues inside document)

Download Whistleblowing Policy - Jan 2024
